div.p: (69-1474), VPRS 44/200/69-461, Public Record Office of Victoria.

To proof.
Although the letter is numbered as given, it is filed under 69-461 staff matters and annotated: 'Application by Carl Wilhelmi South Yarra, 26 January 1869, for a testimonial. Referred to Dr Mueller 2.2.69'.
I have much pleasure in certifying that Mr C. Wilhelmi has been an officer of the botanic Garden since 1856, that he has with regularity kept the office time proscribed for the service, that he has attended all regularly to such work as was entrusted to him and has good moral principles.
